description: Facts and certain transport-related documents about the London Borough of Hounslow

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["We partner with Hounslow to implement the Mayor's Transport Strategy in the borough."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP)"}

The LIP is produced by the London Borough of Hounslow and agreed with us. It sets out the details on transport infrastructure changes in a three-year period to support the Mayor's Transport Strategy .

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) allocation 2019/20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/hounslow-2019-20-lip-allocation-letter.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 221KB","image":{}},{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) confirmation letter 2017/18 - Borough Leader","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/1718-lip-confirmation-leader-letter-hounslow.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 92KB","image":{}},{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) confirmation letter 2016/17","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/lip-funding-confirmation-letters-16-17-hounslow.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 75KB","image":{}},{"title":"Local Implementation Plan (LIP) delivery plan letter","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/hounslow-lip-delivery-plan-letter.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 70KB","image":{}},{"title":"Public Transport Access Levels - Hounslow","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/public-transport-access-levels-hounslow.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 3.20MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Find out more about LIP funding.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"LIP targets for Hounslow"}
Each borough has set targets in their LIP against the Mayor's Transport Strategy outcomes - we track and report on progress against these targets in the LIP3 MTS outcomes borough data pack .
For example, the car ownership in the borough was 101,977 in 2017. The LIP target to reduce car ownership by 2021 is 99,200.
Residents in Hounslow made an average of 526,000 trips each day between 2015 and 2018 by:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Car and motorcycle: 42%","Tube/DLR: 7%","National Rail and London Overground: 5%","Bus/Tram: 14%","Taxi/Other: 1%","Cycle: 3%","Walking: 23%"]}
We also work with boroughs to encourage more cycling . We recorded 17,647 daily cycle trips on average starting in Hounslow between 2015 and 2018.
More resident and visitor population figures are on the GLA website.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Funding for your borough"}
We provide funding to boroughs and local communities for transport improvements in your local area.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Vision Zero"}

We are working with boroughs to reduce the number of deaths and serious injuries from all road collisions to zero by 2041. They are responsible for enforcing safe speeds on their roads, as well as leading community programmes to encourage using roads safely. Find out more about Vision Zero .
In 2017 there were 114 individuals killed or seriously injured in Hounslow. Our target for 2022 is to reduce this number to 65.
Find out more about collisions in your borough.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"What we're working on in Hounslow"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["We consult local communities on a range of projects every year - \u003ca href=\"https://consultations.tfl.gov.uk/consultation_finder/?advanced=1\u0026st=open\"\u003esearch on the TfL Consultation Hub\u003c/a\u003e ","Find out about \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events\"\u003emajor works and events near you\u003c/a\u003e ","See some ongoing TfL \u003ca href=\"http://www.tfl.gov.uk/travel-information/improvements-and-projects/?Borough=Hounslow\"\u003eimprovements and projects in or near Hounslow\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Work now going on in your borough includes:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eSouth Chiswick\u003c/strong\u003e - Hounslow has funding for their ambitious \u003ca href=\"/info-for/boroughs/liveable-neighbourhoods\"\u003eLiveable Neighbourhoods\u003c/a\u003e scheme in South Chiswick. We will work closely with their team to make sure the project brings Healthy Streets benefits for as many people as possible","\u003cstrong\u003eHogarth roundabout\u003c/strong\u003e - we're developing a scheme to make this busy west London junction operate more smoothly and to bring \u003ca href=\"/corporate/about-tfl/how-we-work/planning-for-the-future/healthy-streets\"\u003eHealthy Streets\u003c/a\u003e and safety benefits for all road users","\u003cstrong\u003eFeltham town centre\u003c/strong\u003e - the project includes extending the platforms at Feltham station and a new pedestrian and cycle bridge. Hounslow Council will also improve Feltham High Street. This regeneration project is partly funded through the borough's Local Implementation Plan"]}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Bus network changes"}
From time to time - after consulting the public - we alter bus routes to reflect changing patterns in demand. We also make temporary changes, often because of road works. See the latest bus changes.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ)"}
To improve air quality the ULEZ will extend to parts of Hounslow from October 2021 .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Our assets in Hounslow"}
Assets we maintain in your borough include:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Eight Tube stations","One London Overground station","Around 680 bus stops - \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps_/bus-spider-maps?Query=Hounslow\"\u003esee all 46 day bus routes in Hounslow\u003c/a\u003e ","One taxi rank","Around 215 traffic signals","Over 33 kilometres of \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/modes/driving/red-routes/red-route-maps\"\u003ered routes\u003c/a\u003e "]}
See a map of our assets in London.
We maintain our assets until they need to be renewed or disposed of as set out in our asset management plan. We do this by:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Servicing them regularly to keep them operational","Repairing or replacing faulty assets"]}
Report a problem on a London street with our Streetcare tool .
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"We do not maintain in Hounslow:"}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Non-red route roads - these roads are maintained by \u003ca href=\"http://www.hounslow.gov.uk\"\u003eHounslow\u003c/a\u003e ","Litter removal on red routes - this is also the borough's responsibility","Network Rail track at London Overground stations - \u003ca href=\"https://www.networkrail.co.uk/communities/contact-us/\"\u003econtact Network Rail\u003c/a\u003e ","Taxis and mini cabs - these are owned by \u003ca href=\"/modes/taxis-and-minicabs/what-to-expect-from-your-journey\"\u003etaxi drivers and minicab offices \u003c/a\u003e ","Five bus garages in Hounslow that are \u003ca href=\"/modes/buses/who-runs-your-bus\"\u003eowned and managed by bus companies\u003c/a\u003e ","Coaches"," \u003ca href=\"/info-for/taxis-and-private-hire/taxi-ranks\"\u003eTaxi ranks\u003c/a\u003e on borough roads. Cars and other vehicles parked on taxi ranks can be \u003ca href=\"https://www.hounslow.gov.uk/info/20052/parking\"\u003ereported to Hounslow\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Report private hire vehicles (PHVs) parked on ranks or unattended taxis on ranks directly to us.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Dealing with severe weather"}
For documents relating to winter service in the boroughs, go to the Streets publications page .
